It is possible that if the debt load would change by either changing the interest rate associated with the funding or the size of the financing would change, then obviously we would reduce the burden associated with carrying the debt and we could be profitable. down the pipeline,'' the minister said. Labour claimed the decision to appoint Andy Coulson to such a senior Downing Street post raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment. Ed Miliband , the Labour leader, said: The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. He's now done the right thing but he should have done it earlier. I think it raises real questions about David Cameron 's judgment that he hung on to Andy Coulson for so long. Downing Street sources dismissed Labour's criticism and insisted the prime minister believed that Andy Coulson 's professionalism in sharpening up the Tories' media operation after his appointment in 2007 vindicated David Cameron 's original decision. talk of a Mike Pence presidential run. A regular speaker at tea parties, Mike Pence is one of a small number of elected Republicans with an appeal to economic, social and national security conservatives,'' he writes. Last fall, the presidential talk got a boost when he won the straw poll at the Value Voters' summit, surprising many who assumed that Mike Huckabee had it in the bag. Philip Klein believes Mike Pence may see 2012 as a better opportunity to run for president than a future date. Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Groundwork OpenSource offers open source IT management software Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
